channel.title: Phnom Penh on Travel.Sleep.Repeat
channel.description: Recent content in Phnom Penh on Travel.Sleep.Repeat

item.title: Phnom Penh, The Killing Fields and S-21
item.description: Royal Palace After a couple hours queueing to get our Cambodian visa, a bus change and yet a few more hours on the road we eventually reached Phnom Penh. What surprised me as soon as I got off the bus were the sheer number of tuk tuk drivers bombarding every passenger! Already being savvy we had pre-planned our route to the hotel so managed to dodge the fares and walk.
